long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
STAGING Doormat Extension creates an injected connection to the Doormat Web-Wallet. This connection is facilitated via a `EIP6963` compliant provider injected into the content script at `window.ethereum.`

The Doormat Web-Wallet is a web application hosted at https://staging.doormat.xyz

The Web-Wallet letâ€™s users interact with decentralized-apps (dapps) by acting as a secure sandboxed runtime where crypto-messages can be signed.
